articles.title: Consumer Strength Is More than Tesla Stock. 3 Charts Tell the Story
articles.mainIdea: Consumer Strength Is More than Tesla Stock. 3 Charts Tell the Story
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Consumer Strength Is More than Tesla Stock. 3 Charts Tell the Story. The consumer discretionary group displayed notable strength last week. The overall strength was also notable given Friday’s disappointing Michigan Consumer Sentiment reading. The XLY ETF is holding just above a potential double-bottom pivot near $121.60. Related tickers mentioned: ADDDF, FIVE, GAP, NKE, RVLV, TSLA, XLY.

articles.title: Home Depot vs. Lowe’s: Only 1 of These Home Improvement Stocks Is a Buy for 2026
articles.mainIdea: Home Depot vs. Lowe’s: Only 1 of These Home Improvement Stocks Is a Buy for 2026
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Home Depot vs. Lowe’s: Only 1 of These Home Improvement Stocks Is a Buy for 2026. The home improvement sector has endured a tough 2025, as elevated interest rates and a sluggish housing market suppressed consumer spending on renovations and DIY projects. The Home Depot (NYSE:HD) stock has declined 11% year-to-date, while Lowe’s (NYSE:LOW) is down 2.6%. Although the Federal Reserve has begun cutting rates, mortgage rates remain high, existing-home sales ... Home Depot vs. Lowe’s: Only 1 of These Home Improvement Stocks Is a Buy for 2026 Related tickers mentioned: LOW.
